definition: Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand

sentences.english: This generous wine feels softer when paired with the Sautéed Rice with Seafood and Thailand Shrimp Paste.
sentences.chinese: 這慷慨的酒和泰式蝦膏海鮮炒飯搭配時顯得溫柔一些。

sentences.english: My Thai chicken recipe calls for ground coriander.
sentences.chinese: 我的泰式燒雞塊需要碎芫荽。

sentences.english: The food is high standard Thai fare at reasonable prices.
sentences.chinese: 嗨泰的菜是高級的泰式食材和合理的價格。

sentences.english: Learn to prepare and cook by you own hands.
sentences.chinese: 您可以嘗試親手準備並且烹飪泰式菜餚。

sentences.english: The cookbook has a combination of Thai and Italian recipes.
sentences.chinese: 這本食譜是泰式和義式食譜的結合。

sentences.english: Fried fish cake, spiced with Thai curry and kaffir lime leaves.
sentences.chinese: 油煎魚餅配泰式咖喱，青檸檬葉。

sentences.english: You should try that Thai restaurant on Nicolson Street.
sentences.chinese: 你應該去尼克森街那家泰式料理喫喫看。

sentences.english: Maybe we should try a  Thai massage  too.
sentences.chinese: 或許我們還應該試一試泰式按摩。

sentences.english: Marinade chicken with Woh Hup Thai Red Curry Paste for 30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 將雞肉與和合泰式紅咖喱醬拌勻，醃製半小時。

sentences.english: Thai food is regularly rated as some of the best in the world.
sentences.chinese: 泰式料理通常被列爲世界上數一數二的美食。

sentences.english: A simple Thai curry paste consists of dried chillies, shallots and shrimp paste.
sentences.chinese: 一個簡單的泰式咖喱醬由幹辣椒，蔥和蝦醬。

sentences.english: I hope that I can go to massage before I go back to China.
sentences.chinese: 真希望在回中國之前可以去試試泰式按摩。

sentences.english: Flat thai rice noodle in our very famous spicy tom yum soup with king prawns.
sentences.chinese: 著名的辣味冬蔭功配大蝦和泰式寬河粉。

sentences.english: Maybe we should try a Thai massage。
sentences.chinese: 或許我們應該試一試泰式按摩。

sentences.english: Thai food is among the spiciest in the world.
sentences.chinese: 泰式飲食算得上是世界上最辣的。

sentences.english: We have Thai or Chinese Massage and Foot Massage and so on.
sentences.chinese: 我們這裏有泰式按摩和中式按摩，沐足等。

definition: bak-kut-teh or pork ribs soup, popular in Malaysia and Singapore
laksa, spicy noodle soup of Southeast Asia
to pass an exam (or the imperial exam)/to qualify
to prepare (food etc) using a secret recipe
